website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and style define the Reebok Classic Leather EBK sneakers very well. These remakes of the iconic Classic Leather shoes are well-built, uses premium materials, and are sturdy enough for long-distance walks and fitness activities. They’re also light, have a perfect fit, warm, and are grippy even on wet surfaces. They may have a darker hue than pictured but are otherwise excellent footwear overall.
pros: The Reebok Classic Leather EBK sneakers are comfortable right from the start, according to most reviewers
Many individuals describe the low-top shoes as “fashionable,” “go with everything,” and “look gorgeous on the legs.”
Plenty of purchasers commend the lifestyle shoes’ color combinations
The Reebok Classic Leather EBK are well-made sneakers that use quality materials, several users have reported
A good number of consumers have commented that the shoes give excellent value for money
The low-top footwear has the perfect fit widthwise, according to some
The Classic Leather EBK sneakers are lightweight, which makes them perfect for long-distance walking and low-intensity workouts, a few testers have noted
The casual shoes have good traction, according to a customer
He has added that he uses them to walk on ice and that the footwear grips very well
One person has mentioned that the Reebok Classic Leather EBK shoes feel warm—perfect for cold days
cons: Two people have remarked that the color of this casual footwear from Reebok is darker in person than what is pictured
One individual has complained that the soles of the shoes give off a squeaky sound when walking
A customer has said that the shoes are comfortable but do not have a lot of cushioning in them

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coal/white for the father of my children. He has a wide foot and spends a lot of time on his feet so good shoes are very important. He said this shoe has less padding than most Reebok classics he has worn but the fit is much better for his wide foot. Upon putting them on they instantly felt broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany hoppes

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, and I get compliments on them frequently. I don't like to feel my to in the end of the toe box so I always go 1/2 size up on tennis shoes or any boxy-toed shoe styles. I wear a size 8 women's in most all shoes, which would be 6 in men's sizes, but for these men's Reeboks I ordered a 6.5. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I buy Reeboks all the time online because I know their product and like their product. This is the first time I've ever bought a Reebok product that didn't flt perfectly. As it fits on the small side, you may want to buy 1/2 size larger than usual. Otherwise nice looking and up to Reebok standards.
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioSting

customer_reviews.title: Are they a real Reebok shoes???
customer_reviews.text: I been buying Reebok brand for ages but this time I was extremely disappointing. Shoes seems to have a really bad quality, some edges inside shoe is really bad (see picture with pointing arrow), poor seam quality for a $ 90 shoes ...
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Price Tag
customer_reviews.text: Just received my retro reebox and I'm in love! I was e expected them on Friday but was told they would be delivered on Tuesday so imagine my surprised when they arrived today two days early. however what I could've lived without know was they were 29.99. I paid 57.99 plus taxes which brought it to 61.46. I pulled that lovely Marshall's tag off the shoes and wasn't thrilled to know I paid double. But, I guess it was worth it as they are dope and feel good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality shoes, the sole of the shoe took off
customer_reviews.text: Payed $80 for a pair of shoes that last only one week and and wore only a couple times, I am very dissapointed, My conception about Reebok, always was good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: A modern take on real Reebok Classics
customer_reviews.text: Most Classics today are watered down versions of what Reebok once offered. These Reebok Classics are well built with a sufficient tongue and ample insulation just like the Reeboks of the 80s. They’re more stylish than the photos make them appear. Sadly, they run larger than other Classics.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: That they're the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned and I've got a thang for shoes. All these years and all pairs of shoes I've owned and still own. That I could of been wearing the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned??? I'm a new Reebok fan. And a huge after owning my first pair of classics. The first and only pair I had ever had before these classics was when I was in 1st grade early 90's rocked it with them pumps. And dont remember the comfort in them just thought they made me jump higher. So new fan right here. These kicks are so wassup all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Scott Jones

customer_reviews.title: Hip Vintage Style!
customer_reviews.text: Totally loved this shoe BETTER than expected!!!! Nice vintage look. Very comfortable-wore the entire day on my feet 12 hrs. I have a narrow foot so I didn’t mace them too tight but I would imagine they run narrow for wider sizes.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend if you like comfortable tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They are much more comfortable than the standard Reebok classics which I have quite a few variations of. The leather is very soft and conforms to my feet perfectly. I am a cyclist, so I wear these for walking only.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback was that the leather part kind of rubbed my toes a bit raw at first. The need to be broken in a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Just exactly as expected, beautiful and confortable. I will definitely buy to this seller again.

customer_reviews.title: very recommended !! A +++++
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful shoes in a classic sports look and comfort for walking, very recommended !! A +++++

customer_reviews.title: Buy em larger
customer_reviews.text: Great style but had to send them back because they were too small. I wear an 11 in adidas (my current shoe) with comfort. I bought these in 11 and my toes were getting squished from the front and sides.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always buy a few pairs of these when they go on sale. Good comfortable shoe for good price.

customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks good but it is not comfortable. It's hard sole and not good for long walk.

customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes fit and look. They have just started to wear in and they feel awesome. A very nice tight but not too tight feel. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: There is not as much padding in the insole as ...
customer_reviews.text: There is not as much padding in the insole as the DMX Max. I will continue buy the DMX Max from Reebok The return policy is hard to beat.
